mapper.select: select or_num ,or_me_id ,or_date ,or_state ,or_request ,or_ad_num ,or_price, or_pname ,or_tel ,or_post ,or_addr1 ,or_addr2 ,or_email from order where or_num = #{orNum}
mapper.insert: insert into order(or_me_id, or_date, or_request, or_price, or_pname, or_tel, or_post, or_addr1, or_addr2, or_email) values(#{or_me_id}, now(), #{or_request}, #{or_price}, #{or_pname}, #{or_tel}, #{or_post}, #{or_addr1}, #{or_addr2}, #{or_email})
insert into order_detail(od_amount, od_price, od_or_num, od_po_num) values(#{od_amount}, #{od_price}, #{od_or_num}, #{od_po_num})
